# MarkItDown Dependencies

# Full installation (all features)
markitdown[all]>=0.1.0

# markitdown[pdf]>=0.1.0
# markitdown[docx]>=0.1.0
# markitdown[pptx]>=0.1.0
# markitdown[xlsx]>=0.1.0
# markitdown[audio]>=0.1.0
# markitdown[image]>=0.1.0
# markitdown[azure-doc-intelligence]>=0.1.0
# markitdown[llm]>=0.1.0
